alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 8:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER... NORTHWESTERN FALL RIVER AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM MDT... At 803 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Elk Mountain Lookout to near Angostura Reservoir. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Dewey, Argyle, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Burdock, Cascade Falls, Cold Brook Reservoir, Angostura Reservoir, Elk Mountain Lookout, and southwestern Wind Cave National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
